Class OutgoingMessageManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.OutgoingMessageManager
public class OutgoingMessageManager
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to send every kind of Message to the clients

      public void buildNegativeResponse​(Player player, ResponseContent responseContent, java.lang.String gameManagerSays)
      Build the a ServerResponse with MessageStatus.ERROR
      Parameters:
      gameManagerSays - the message from the ActionManager
      player - the player whose response is for
      responseContent - the response content

      public void buildServerRequest​(Player player, ServerRequestContent content, Worker activeWorker)
      Build a specific ServerRequest based on the ServerRequestContent and send it to the Player
      Parameters:
      player - the Player to whom the request is intended
      content - the ServerRequestContent
      activeWorker - the Worker the player has to move/built with.
